messages.content: Hello, thank you for calling Nestlé customer service. My name is Betrace. May I know your name, please?
Nice to meet you, Hannah. How can I assist you today?
I'm really disappointed with the Nespresso Coffee Capsules I bought recently. I've been feeling unwell after drinking the coffee.
I'm very sorry to hear that, Hannah. Could you please describe the health issues you've experienced?
Sure. I've had stomach aches and nausea after drinking the coffee. I'm concerned it might be something in the capsules.
That sounds very concerning. We take such issues seriously. Have you tried any other food or beverages recently that might have caused this?
No, I haven't changed anything else in my diet. It's only after drinking the Nespresso coffee.

Thank you for providing this information, Hannah. I will report this to our quality control team immediately. Could you please provide me with the batch number and expiration date on the capsule packaging?
Sure, the batch number is A12345 and the expiration date is 05/2024.
Thank you, Hannah. We will investigate this issue thoroughly. In the meantime, I recommend discontinuing use of the capsules. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
No, that's all. I just hope this gets resolved quickly. I'm really disappointed.
I completely understand, Hannah. We will work on this as a priority. Thank you for bringing it to our attention and please accept our apologies for the inconvenience.
